questions.question: What is the dominant color of the picture frame's exterior?

What is the overall shape of the presented picture frame?
What color are the depicted flowers within the frame's image?

What is the style of the image displayed within the frame?
Does the frame exhibit a noticeable bevel or a flat profile?

Does the image inside suggest any artistic manipulation of the subject?
Can one visually discern any noticeable grain in the frame's material?
What is the apparent orientation of the picture within its frame?
Does the frame show any visible embellishments or decorative elements?
Is the matting within the frame visible and what color is it?
